rows.label: tlk70000063_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I've been hearing news of your
adventures lately. Exciting stuff!

rows.label: tlk70000063_04_msg0002
rows.name:
My other adventurer friends keep going
on about this amazing band of Drivers
and Blades. They mean you, of course!

rows.label: tlk70000063_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Me, I've known you were something
else since I found out you could control
the flow of ether AND kick beast butt.

rows.label: tlk70000063_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes, "beast butt" is the scientific term.
In any case, your talents are going to
end up helping all sorts of people.

rows.label: tlk70000063_04_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm going to work hard to solve the
mystery of ether miasmas and help
loads of people, too!
